hints.title: Matching-Conditional Contraction
hints.content:
2070: :label: prop-matching-conditional-contraction
2071: 
2072: For a fixed matching $M$:
2073: 
2074: $$
2075: \mathbb{E}[W_2^2(\mu_{S_1'}, \mu_{S_2'}) \mid M, S_1, S_2] \leq \gamma_{\text{pair}} W_2^2(\mu_{S_1}, \mu_{S_2}) + C_{\text{pair}}
2076: $$
